点着: (てんちゃく) - spot application; dispensing a drop or spot of something
点睛: (てんせい) - adding eyes and other finishing touches to an animal painting
点穴: (てんけつ) - pressure points (e.g. for application of moxa); vulnerable body cavities
点突然変異: (てんとつぜんへんい) - point mutation
点綴: (てんてつ) - a line (of mountains, islands, houses, etc.); bound together
点線: (てんせん) - dotted line; perforated line
点者: (てんじゃ) - critic of haiku poetry
点茶: (てんちゃ) - boiling tea (for a tea ceremony)
点頭く: (うなづく) - to nod; to bow one's head in assent; to agree
為: (i) - fazer, bem, vantagem, benefício, bem-estar; causa, propósito, objetivo, meta; consequência, resultado, efeito; afetando, referente a, concernente a
為さい: (なさい) - (imperative form often used after the -masu stem of a verb)  do ...
為しおえる: (なしおえる) - to accomplish; to finish
為し終える: (なしおえる) - to accomplish; to finish
為し遂げる: (なしとげる) - to accomplish; to finish; to fulfill
為す: (なす) - (esp. 成す) to build up/to establish; (esp. 成す) to form/to become (a state); to accomplish/to achieve/to succeed in; to change into; (esp. 為す) to do/to perform; to intend to/to attempt/to try
為す術もない: (なすすべもない) - at one's wits end
為す術もなく: (なすすべもなく) - at one's wit's end
為す術も無い: (なすすべもない) - at one's wits end
為す術も無く: (なすすべもなく) - at one's wit's end
為せば成る: (なせばなる) - if you have a mind to do something, you can do it; if you do, it will become ...; where there is a will...
為せる: (させる) - to make (someone) do; to allow (someone) to
為に: (ために) - for/for the sake of/to one's advantage/in favor of/in favour of/on behalf of; because of/as a result of
為にする: (ためにする) - to have an ulterior motive; to have an axe to grind
為になる: (ためになる) - to be of benefit; to be useful; to be good for you
為に成る: (ためになる) - to be of benefit; to be useful; to be good for you
為る: (なる) - to become/to get/to grow/to be/to reach/to attain; to result in/to prove to be; to consist of/to be composed of; to succeed/to be complete; to change into/to be exchanged for; to play a role; {shogi} to be promoted; (as お+masu-stem+になる, ご+noun+になる, etc.) to do ...
為るように為る: (なるようになる) - (proverb) let nature take its course; what will be will be
為る様に為る: (なるようになる) - (proverb) let nature take its course; what will be will be
為れつつある: (されつつある) - to be in the process of doing
為れる: (される) - honorific or passive form of the verb "suru"
為ん方無い: (せんかたない) - it cannot be helped/there is no way; intolerable/unbearable
為人: (ひととなり) - hereditary disposition/temperament/nature; body build
為付ける: (しつける) - to be used to/to get accustomed to/to be in the habit of doing; to train/to discipline/to teach manners; to tack (in needlework)/to baste; to plant (esp. rice seedlings)
為体: (ていたらく) - state of affairs; predicament
為公会: (いこうかい) - Iko-kai (faction of the LDP)
為出かす: (しでかす) - to make a mess; to perpetrate; to do; to finish up; to be guilty of
為出来す: (しでかす) - to make a mess; to perpetrate; to do; to finish up; to be guilty of
為初: (しぞめ) - outset/beginning/starting (things); resuming work after the New Year's vacation
為初め: (しぞめ) - outset/beginning/starting (things); resuming work after the New Year's vacation
為初める: (しそめる) - to begin to do
為始める: (しはじめる) - to begin; to start
為尽くす: (しつくす) - to leave nothing undone; to do all in one's might; to do everything possible
為尽す: (しつくす) - to leave nothing undone; to do all in one's might; to do everything possible
為悪い: (しにくい) - (suru verb ending) hard to do
為所: (しどころ) - appropriate time to do (something); occasion when (something) must be done
為手: (して) - doer/performer; protagonist (in noh or kyogen)/hero/leading part/main character; (仕手 only) speculator (in trading)
為損じる: (しそんじる) - to blunder; to fail; to make a mistake
為損ずる: (しそんずる) - to blunder; to fail; to make a mistake
為損なう: (しそこなう) - to blunder; to fail; to make a mistake; to miss
為放題: (しほうだい) - having one's own way; giving free reign to one's desires; acting as one pleases
為書: (ためがき) - dedication (e.g. in books); inscription
為書き: (ためがき) - dedication (e.g. in books); inscription
為替: (kawase) - money order, draft; exchange (por exemplo, estrangeiro)
為替ダンピング: (かわせダンピング) - exchange dumping
為替取引: (かわせとりひき) - currency trading (usu. foreign); exchange dealing; exchange transaction
為替差損益: (かわせさそんえき) - foreign exchange profit or loss; foreign exchange gain or loss
為替差益: (かわせさえき) - profit on currency exchange
為替平価: (かわせへいか) - par value; exchange parity
為替相場メカニズム: (かわせそうばメカニズム) - Exchange Rate Mechanism; ERM
為来り: (しきたり) - custom; conventional practice; mores; ordinance
為業: (しわざ) - deed (esp. negative); act; action; one's doing
為済ます: (しすます) - to succeed as planned; to carry through; to accomplish
為直す: (しなおす) - to do over; to remake; to resume
